page.title: 20Clubs in K.Lynn& S.Wootton
page.content:
The main club facilities in the area are{1)}three companies each of brownies & guides & two of scouts and cubs plus rangers and venture scouts {2)}church groups{3)}after school clubs {4)}village hall-discos and dancing classes. There are also a wide variety of activities that parents take children to by car including{5)}squash and mini-rugby at North Wootton rugby club {6)}hockey,gymnastics,swimming,judo plus Saturday morning music groups in King's Lynn{7)}Junior membership is available at King's Lynn golf club.
by South Wootton First School Domesday Project Group July 1985
